expertise: You are an expert in material preparation.
initialization: Answer the questions as truthfully as possible. Answer No if you are unsure.
conclusion: This paragraph describe the preparation of a material, containing the experimental conditions used? Answer yes or no with no justification. Material prepation consists in procedures use to synthetize a new material or modify an alredy existing one. Note that characterization procedures such as FTIR, X-ray difraction or N2 physorption do not count as preparation procedures.
